name: The Shores of the Styx (NoelStudios)
description:
Hello everyone! 

Welcome to my first ever game! 

Follow the story of Adrian a little boy who is adventuring into the underworld in ancient Greece times to try and rescue his mom from eternal damnation.  His mom was not able to get the two coins necessary to cross over the river Styx. 

Its a 2d platformer that I participated on my other account on my first game jam GJL Parad2020. It was never about winning for me the game jam but it was always about the hope that I would finish a game in 7 days. I did that and now I look forward to working on my little project and make it better and bigger.

Controls:

WASD or arrows- to move

Space - jump

Left Click Mouse Button-interact with chat

Right Click Mouse Button- interact with transition opening.

Hope you enjoy it give me any feedback so that I can try and continue to update the game. Currently is free for all will not request any donation the hope is in the future if the game is looking a lot better and works well to release it on steam.
